title: Hiver & Nick with MVS Canada Logistics - Ship Your Car With The Experts

signals.problem_statement: The AI tagging feature is not functioning as expected, causing frustration in automating workflows.
signals.context: Using AI features for automations, specifically tagging and extracting information from emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about how to set up multiple shared inboxes and whether they need to duplicate automations for each inbox.
signals.context: Planning to create multiple email addresses for different functions (quotes, tracking) and seeking clarity on automation setup.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to extract order IDs and other identifiers from emails to streamline their workflow.
signals.suggested_solution: Extracting phone numbers, VINs, and order IDs into custom fields for easier access.
signals.context: Managing logistics and tracking shipments, looking for automation to reduce manual searching.

signals.problem_statement: The current UI experience for scrolling through extracted data is cumbersome, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.context: Working with a large number of order IDs and needing a smoother interface for data extraction.
